channel.title: 317 High mem?
channel.description: Hello, I'm having an issue logging into my server using a client, set to high memory. It will call the initialize method in the Client, like it normally would, but it would stop there, and then the client would throw a Java heap space error. Is this a problem with the client, or the server?

item.title: 317 High mem?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

This is on a 317. I think it’s some setting in the server, but I’m not sure…

Read full topic

item.title: 317 High mem?
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

hmm well i use a rs client to get on rs, and it only shows a java heap space error when it takes to much memory like in w2 around the g.e…

Read full topic

item.title: 317 High mem?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

No, something between the server and client communications is causing it to throw a java heap space error. And I was wondering what it is that is doing it.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 High mem?

@Explisionist wrote:

most likly the client is using to much memory?
